## Biscuits

```{r}
source("R/functions.R")
```

```{r}
recipes <- readxl::read_excel("recipes.xlsx")

recipe_names <- get_recipe_names(recipes, "biscuits")
```

```{r}
#| output: asis

res <- purrr::map_chr(recipe_names, \(recipe) {
  knitr::knit_child(input = "child-dir/_child.qmd",
                    envir = environment(),
                    quiet = TRUE)
})

cat(res, sep = '\n')
```
